tool.name: tool_6

param.name: FLOW_METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Flow Distribution

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Deterministic 8

[1] Rho 8

[2] Braunschweiger Reliefmodell

[3] Deterministic Infinity

[4] Multiple Flow Direction

[5] Multiple Triangular Flow Direction

[6] Multiple Maximum Downslope Gradient Based Flow Direction

Default: 0

tool.summary: This tool calculates the mean height, mean slope and mean aspect of the upslope contributing area.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J.
